conversation: Creating a folder on Claude master desktop
code:
$claudeMaster = "$env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\claude_master"
cd $claudeMaster

Write-Host "🔍 Finding all ZIP files..."
Get-ChildItem -Path . -Filter *.zip -Recurse | ForEach-Object {
    Write-Host "📦 Unzipping: $($_.Name)"
    Expand-Archive -Path $_.FullName -DestinationPath $_.DirectoryName -Force
    Write-Host "✅ Extracted: $($_.Name)"
}

Write-Host "🎉 All apps unzipped!"
Write-Host "📊 Total directories:"
(Get-ChildItem -Directory).Count

conversation: Creating a folder on Claude master desktop
code:
cd $env:USERPROFILE\Desktop\claude_master
Get-ChildItem -Directory | Select-Object Name | Out-File apps_list.txt
Get-Content apps_list.txt
